svg.text: Three Doors Visual Identity & Energy-Truth Color Palette

g.text: Molten Metal ‚Ä¢ Volcanic Energy ‚Ä¢ Fire Elements
Ethereal Mist ‚Ä¢ Sacred Geometry ‚Ä¢ Spirit Elements
‚Ä¢ Color Contrast: All text maintains 4.5:1 ratio minimum
‚Ä¢ Motion Sensitivity: Reduced motion options for all animations
‚Ä¢ 60Hz Target: All color transitions respect 16.67ms frame budget
‚Ä¢ Hardware Scaling: Colors adapt to Low/Mid/High tier capabilities
‚Ä¢ Energy Truth: Every color maps to measurable WVMP metrics
‚Ä¢ High Contrast Mode: Monochrome fallback preserves meaning
‚Ä¢ CSS Custom Properties: All colors exported as CSS variables
‚Ä¢ React Theme Context: Door selection updates global theme
‚Ä¢ Visual Regression Testing: Automated color contrast validation

svg.text: Users can distinguish between all energy states ‚Ä¢ Door themes maintain visual consistency across all levels ‚Ä¢ 60Hz performance maintained
